docs.title: Welcome to Rodyssey wiki
docs.text: Discord community available here .

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to Rodyssey officiel wiki for our server. You can find every details of every features of the server, patch notes, custom quests, instances, game mechanics, and much more.

docs.title: Table of contents
docs.text:
• Server features
  • Custom NPC
  • War of Emperium
  • Custom Events

docs.title: Custom Events
docs.text: The world of Rodyssey is plenty of custom events to make sure our population enjoys the server even more. Come play and receive great rewards, including Rodyssey Coins!

docs.title: Disguise Events
docs.text: Every 2 Hours, come in Prontera and compete against other players to guess the monster in disguise. Will you be the fastest typer?

docs.title: Battle Gambling
docs.text: Every 4 hours, come gamble in a duel between 2 pecos.

docs.title: Mushroom Gathering
docs.text: Every Monday at 9:00PM (CEST)

docs.title: Plant Gathering
docs.text: Every Tuesday at 9:00PM (CEST)

docs.title: Last Man Standing
docs.text: Every Wednesday at 9:00PM (CEST)

docs.title: Gold Rush
docs.text: Every Thursday at 9:00PM (CEST)

docs.title: MVP World
docs.text: Every Thursday at 10:00PM (CEST)

docs.title: King Poring
docs.text: Every Friday at 9:00PM (CEST)

docs.title: Server commands
docs.text: Below are a small list of commands that are available to the players.

docs.title: @accept
docs.text: Accept a duel

docs.title: @alootid/aloottype
docs.text: Starts or stops autolooting a specified item/type.

docs.title: @autoloot
docs.text: Enables or disables autolooting items from killed mobs.

docs.title: @autotrade / at
docs.text: Allows you continue vending offline, then logs off.

docs.title: @bgrank
docs.text: Display the BattleGround ranking.

docs.title: @changedress
docs.text: Removes all character costumes.

docs.title: @changegm
docs.text: Changes the guildmaster of your guild to another member.

docs.title: @commands
docs.text: Displays a list of @ commands available to the player.

docs.title: @duel
docs.text: Starts a duel.

docs.title: @hominfo
docs.text: For Alchemist class, use to check the status of the current homunculus.

docs.title: @homstats
docs.text: Displays homunculus stats in different formats.

docs.title: @invite
docs.text: Propose a player to a duel.

docs.title: @iteminfo / ii
docs.text: Use to search item information in-game.

docs.title: @joinbg
docs.text: This command is used to join the queue to enter BG.

docs.title: @joinevent
docs.text: Brings you to the active automated event.

docs.title: @killcount / kc
docs.text: Added @killcount command to count killed monsters.

docs.title: @leave
docs.text: Leave a duel

docs.title: @leavebg
docs.text: This command is used to leave the queue to enter BG.

docs.title: @lgp
docs.text: When enabled, offers various on-screen enhancements to improve gameplay.

docs.title: @listenbg
docs.text: Ignore the BG announcements.

docs.title: @memo
docs.text: Saves a warp point for the "Warp Portal" skill.

docs.title: @mobinfo / mi
docs.text: Use to search monster details in-game.

docs.title: @mvprank
docs.text: Display the MVP ranking.

docs.title: @noks
docs.text: To prevent other players from stealing your mob.

docs.title: @order
docs.text: Use this command to send a message to all your teammates.

docs.title: @pvprank
docs.text: Display the PVP ranking.

docs.title: @rates
docs.text: Shows the current server rates.

docs.title: @refresh
docs.text: Synchronizes the player's position on the client with the one stored on the server.

docs.title: @reject
docs.text: Reject a duel.

docs.title: @request
docs.text: Sends a message to all connected GMs (via the gm whisper system).

docs.title: @showexp
docs.text: Toggles the display of experience gain messages.

docs.title: @time
docs.text: Shows the current server time.

docs.title: @whereis
docs.text: Displays the maps in which monster normally spawns.

docs.title: @whobuy
docs.text: Displays Buying Stores containing that item.

docs.title: @whodrops
docs.text: Use to check on which mob drops the specific item that you are looking for.

docs.title: @whosell
docs.text: Displays Vending stores containing that item.

docs.title: Rates
docs.text:
• Base: 5x
  • Job: 5x
  • Item: 5x
  • Basic card: 10x
  • MVP card: 1x

docs.title: Server Currency
docs.text: While the server uses zenies as the base currency, it introduces the Rodyssey Coin. At a base drop rate of 10%, it is the currency used for quest hats, and in the main office of Prontera.

docs.title: NPC
docs.text:
• Healer: free up to base level 49, then cost 5.000 Zenies. Gives Increase Agility and Blessing level 10 for 10 minutes.
  • Warpra: Access to town and dungeon level 1. Cost a fee to warp there. You need to access the area you want to warp to.
  • Job Changer: Cost x amount of Rodyssey Coin.
  • Reset stats/skills: first reset is free. After that, it scales with the player's level.
  • Deslotter: located in Prontera's forge
  • Armor Enchanter: located in Battleground's lobby.
  • Stylist
  • Rental Manager
  • Vending Area
  • Plagia Manager
  • Branch Manager
  • Card Recycler
  • Coin Shop
  • Hat Quest

docs.title: Warpra
docs.text: In order to use the warpra, you have to unlock the access to each specific area. For towns, you just need to speak to each individual warpra. Concerning dungeons, you have to find a "Warpra essence" hidden in mostly last levels of each dungeon, after which you can use the warpra to teleport to the first level of the dungeon. Good luck! Every location unlocked is shared with every character of your account.

docs.title: Bank System
docs.text: You don't need to make the bank quest in order to access it. Use "Ctrl B" to access your bank from everywhere. The bank system is shared with every character of your account.

docs.title: RoDex
docs.text: You have access to RoDex to send emails with items attached to it. Please note that there is a fee for every item you attach to your email.

docs.title: Vote Rewards
docs.text:
You can vote for the server. More info here:

  • Rodyssey website

After that, you can find the Vote Rewards NPC in Prontera for rewards.

docs.title: Attendance Rewards
docs.text: Every day, if you connect to the game, a gift will be sent to your account through RoDex system. Please note that every item is account bounded, and you cannot trade them to other players.

docs.title: Fidelity Rewards
docs.text: For every hour played, your account will earn 10 points, capped at 300 points. Exchange these points to the NPC in Prontera!

docs.title: Natural HP/SP recovery are increased
docs.text: When out of combat and sat down, your natural HP/SP recovery is greatly increased.

docs.title: Platinium Skill
docs.text: A NPC is available in Prontera main office to give you your platinium skills. No more time lost in skill quest!

docs.title: Instant teleportation and refresh
docs.text: When using fly wing or @refresh command, instantly refreshes the screen.
